Package Model

Class Report

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Report
  • public class Report
extends java.lang.Object
    Report is used to generate/create a report

              int appointment_id)
        Used to fill the report
        Parameters:
        patient_id - The patient's ID
        name - The patient's name
        dob - The patient's date of birth
        Sex - The patient's sex
        refering_physician - The patient's referring physician
        reason - the reason they were referred
        appointment_id - the appointment of the patient that the image was taken

                              java.lang.String employee_name)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Used to send the report to the database
        Parameters:
        clinicalIndication - The diagnosis of the image
        findings - Additional findings
        image_id - the image id of the report
        exam - the exam taken
        employee_name - The radiologist's name
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the SQL returns an error
